channel.title: Comments for page "The One Sin - Corrupter of Truth"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "The One Sin - Corrupter of Truth"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Oh, the Photo is based off Sin from Final Fantasy X

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: I'm going to nail it on RNGHAET, because i nailed it on the head earlier today. before that, it nailed me early on, and then right when it had 3hp left, death. I have it now, but this one seems to summon unusual RNGHAET…

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: palu, i dont know what season you are, but id advise not even trying to slay One Sin if you can't pull it off. One Sin is by far the easiest phase, to do r00t without spending millions on Heartsongs, you should be at LEAST S10, preferably more like S15 or 20. this will provide more drain levels and allow you to fight at a higher push, which combined = a TON more damage. you should also have K-Belt from the quest Thirty Lives and aim for a Time-Reversal Cube if you see its kai/have enough money. other than that, its all just RNGHAET. remember, dont try without being legacy, use Twilight Guardian for +1 life, you can use a storm favor, and use your Detective Duo team. again, if you cant easily kill One Sin, you probably should wait til a higher season

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: any hints on downing this guy? i got nailed unusually fast first time through—my first attack earned me a lost life, without hesitation, for example.
